member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord
member.summary: Represents a record in the File Cabinet application.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the record.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of the person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of the person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of birth of the person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Age
member.summary: Gets or sets the age of the person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Salary
member.summary: Gets or sets the salary of the person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Gender
member.summary: Gets or sets the gender of the person.
